ygData.subject: Re: Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: I welcome the challenge, Ryo. You picked a pretty bad time to do this, though, not too many people are gonna be able to sneak up on the Alliance base right

I welcome the challenge, Ryo. You picked a pretty bad time to do 
this, though, not too many people are gonna be able to sneak up on 
the Alliance base right now, or for a while yet. But, we'll see who 
gloats in the end (I don't like gloating so its either gonna be you 
or no one).

Friendly tip to everyone: Don't leave your comp cases open and 
unattended if you have animals with claws/teeth in the house. I just 
replaced my video card and half the wires in my comp.


::DevilDuer/Zardus/WarMachine/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Perndabot::

DevilDuer checks his internal scanners as Diamond walks out of the 
room, keeping track of her. He still didn't completely trust her.

He looks back at Vamprah, speaking up as she moves in her 
sleep. "Hey, wake up," he says, ready to fight just in case, "Rest 
time's over."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus frowns, looking at the battle ground, only two Mafia members 
and another bot fighting against the Alliance. He turns around, 
flying off toward the Alliance base.

"Destroy their ship and then return to base," he says into his comm-
link to the Alliance members there, "We will change locations soon."

"Come with me," he says to Najah as he flies by him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WarMachine stumbles back as shots hit him, returning fire at 
Shokaract and Surge, several dozen laser shots and a few missiles 
flying at the two.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike catches up to Life, breathing heavily. "Het, slow down 
here," he says, "WHat are you looking for?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica lands at the Alliance base, entering it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot laughs to himself as Klant leaves, obvioustly mistaking him 
for a Maximal.

"Let's go," he says to BrightBlade, walking out of the room.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...>
